title: Chickpea Veggie Soup
directions: Add the olive oil to a soup pot and heat over medium heat. Once hot, add onions and saute for about 5 minutes, until translucent. Then add the garlic and cook for 3 more minutes.
Add the sweet potato, carrots, chickpeas and water, then turn the heat to high and bring to a boil.

Once the soup is boiling, turn to low and add the oats, 2 tablespoons of the nutritional yeast, marjoram, smoked paprika, basil, thyme and ground rosemary. Cover and simmer until the oats are thoroughly cooked, about 20 to 25 minutes.
Add in the kale and the other 2 tablespoons of nutritional yeast. Cook about 5 to 10 minutes until the kale is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste before serving.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil (use broth or water instead to make the recipe oil-free)
1-1/2 cups peeled and diced sweet potato
1-1/2 cups chopped kale or other green like chard or collards
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
